attributes.action: Jail perpetrators of dog theft ect
attributes.additional_details: When a pet is stolen, it's like losing a child and causes so much heartache to thousands of people.  Dog theft at the moment is on the rise by ruthless thieves, even climbing into people's Gardens, attacking people in the street ripping their dogs from them and needs a swift solution to stop the thieves.
attributes.background: Put into Law Jail sentencing for any animal theft

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for pet theft: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563711

Make dog theft a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216
